Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Rams became the third 11th-seeded team to reach the Final Four, after Louisiana State in 1986 and George Mason in 2006.
snippet: The Rams became the third 11th-seeded team to reach the Final Four, after Louisiana State in 1986 and George Mason in 2006.
